channel.title: CVE Feed for CodeBard -- CodeBard's Patron Button and Widgets for Patreon
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CodeBard -- CodeBard's Patron Button and Widgets for Patreon

item.title: CVE-2023-47524|2023-11-14T21:30:30.391Z -- codebard -- codebard%27s%20patron%20button%20and%20widgets%20for%20patreon
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability (requires PHP 8.x) in CodeBard CodeBard's Patron Button and Widgets for Patreon plugin <= 2.1.9 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-47765|2023-11-22T18:12:35.206Z -- codebard -- codebard%27s%20patron%20button%20and%20widgets%20for%20patreon
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in CodeBard CodeBard's Patron Button and Widgets for Patreon plugin <= 2.1.9 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-30491|2023-08-05T22:35:24.329Z -- codebard -- codebard%27s%20patron%20button%20and%20widgets%20for%20patreon
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in CodeBard CodeBard's Patron Button and Widgets for Patreon plugin <= 2.1.8 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-33928|2024-05-03T07:10:21.484Z -- codebard -- codebard%27s%20patron%20button%20and%20widgets%20for%20patreon
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CodeBard CodeBard's Patron Button and Widgets for Patreon allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects CodeBard's Patron Button and Widgets for Patreon: from n/a through 2.2.0.
